content: the square bag is a simple modern and practical crochet project designed to be fun for beginners and satisfying for experienced makers created during our community crochet along this bag is built from easy textured squares that come together into a stylish everyday accessory if you enjoy relaxing no-pressure projects you ll love this one the construction is straightforward the stitches are beginner-friendly and the finished bag is sturdy enough for daily use make it in one color for a classic look or mix colors for something bold and unique the design works beautifully both ways features beginner-friendly construction modern wearable design easy to customize in size and color perfect for showcasing your yarn choices ❤️ a great first bag project whether you followed along in our cal or you re discovering it on your own the square bag is a fun confidence-building make you ll love using again and again don t forget to add your project to ravelry when you re done i d love to see your version
